docs.text: Deploy by Docker Run docker container by hand $ sudo docker run ppcelery/laisky-blog \ run_gargantua \ --dbhost=mongo32 \ --dbport=27017 \ --debug=false \ --mail_host='smtp.mailgun.org' \ --mail_port=25 \ --mail_subject='Gargantua Error' \ --mail_from_addr='gargantua@laisky.com' \ --mail_to_addrs='a@gmail.com;b@gmail.com;c@gmail.com' \ --mail_username=<YOUR_SMTP_USERNAME> \ --mail_passwd=<YOUR_SMTP_PASSWORD Deploy by docker compose $ cd docker $ docker-compose up -d
